about_the_game:
Pirate Adventure is a famous ride in many parks around the world and also in Orlando Theme Park VR! And using a Virtual Reality device is as awesome as in real life! Enjoy it!

How long it takes for a complete ride?
3 minutes

How many times can I ride it?
An infinite number of times!
